question.input: Acquire an AFM image with dimensions $\pu{1 µm} \times \pu{1 µm}$ at a scan angle of $ 5 degrees $, using the following parameters: P gain = 100, I gain = 5000, D gain = 0, and setpoint = 0.1 V. Save the image with the filename 'Test'. Then, open the latest file in the folder, plot the Z-axis forward image, and save the plot as 'Test.png'.
